snippet: BUTWIN--Lawrence J.,"Larry," age 82. Tragically on February 29. Beloved husband of Joan for over 60 years. Loving father of Richard and Randi, Robert and Meryl and Ellen Begun. Adoring grandfather of Jonathan and Talia Ziskroit, Spencer and Brittany, Samantha, Brandon, and Benjamin. Brother of Jerome and the late Stanley. Loved by all who knew him. Services 1pm Thursday, March 3 at Gutterman's Inc., 175 North Long Beach Road, Rockville Centre. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BUTWIN, LAWRENCE J.
